BlackNightmare:

Balcknightmare kissed him and after that she said softly "promised 
me that you will be careful, I have the feeling that you're in more 
danger than me..."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Yojinbo of Nightmare" 
<bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice:
> 
> "I think, we should keep an optic on him.  He is full of deciete, 
do 
> not readily trust him.  Whatever your sister had planned for him, 
be 
> ready to dispence with him.  He may be as treacherous as 
Starscream."
> Malice did not like his clone at all, it may be him in body, but 
his 
> spark was far differant.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Blacnightmare/Darkfate Nightastrike:

> > >

she

near 
> > > future.
> > >

> > > "I guess we should.  So we're supposed to back up Hellplague?  
> > Why?  
> > > Is she incapible of leading?"
> > > The large form of Splattercannon moved quickly in front of the 
> > black 
> > > and purple clone.
> > > "You should know your place.  You can't question your 
superiors.  
> > Be 
> > > silent and do as you're told."
> > > 
> > > The Sweep commander turned to the other Minion before stepping 
> > back 
> > > to a panel on the wall.
> > > "The Cannon, and anyone near it.  Maximal or Predacon, they 
are 
> > all 
> > > targets."
> > > Hellplague hits a button and the chamber seals it's main door, 
> and 
> > > the room depressurizes.  The the outer door opens, to reveal 
the 
> > > planet below.  Hellplague opens her comm to the other Minions.
> > > "We're are now departing.  Await my signal."
> > > Hellplague transforms and the Sweeps follow suit.  She then 
eases 
> > out 
> > > into space with the Sweeps in formation behind her.
> > > 
> > > 
> > >

wrote:

He

the

questions
